name: Epoxy resin coatings otherwise complying with 21 CFR 175.300(b)(3)(viii) that also contain 1-(2-aminoethyl) piperazine as a crosslinking component
FoodContactSubstance: Epoxy resin coatings otherwise complying with 21 CFR 175.300(b)(3)(viii) that also contain 1-(2-aminoethyl) piperazine as a crosslinking component (CAS Reg. No. 140-31-8).
